item.title: Updating free tier offer of HeroTofu
item.description: https://herotofu.com/ - Forms backend with bot detection and encrypted archive. Forward submissions via UI to email, Slack, or Zapier. Use your own frontend, no server code required. Free plan gives unlimited forms and 100 submissions per month.
